text: São Bento is a parish in the municipality of Angra do Heroísmo on the island of Terceira in the Azores. The population in 2011 was 2,000,Instituto Nacional de Estatística in an area of 10.34 km².Eurostat The parish lies at an elevation of 65 metres above sea level. It contains the localities Caboucos, Canada da Fontinha, Canada do Vale, Carreirinha, Escopins, São Luís and Vale de Linhares. ==References== Category:Parishes of Angra do Heroísmo
title: São Bento (Angra do Heroísmo)
